column2:
'and actions (vers) are used etween SDK and CLI. For example, to list an asset, the'
'list action can e used in oth CLI and SDK. The same list action can e used to list'
'a compute, model, environment, and so on.'
'Use cases for SDK v2'
'The SDK v2 is useful in the following scenarios:'
'\xc2\x7 Use Python functions to uild a single step or a complex workflow'
'SDK v2 allows you to uild a single command or a chain of commands like Python'
'functions - the command has a name, parameters, expects input, and returns'
'output.'
